data.name: mods.de light
YouTube 後で見ない
data.description: サムネイル上に浮かび上がる「後で見る」「キューに追加」のアイコンを非表示にします。

data.name: VK Redesign (2019)
data.description:
Совершенно новый дизайн для вконтакте

Brand new design for Vkontakte

data.name: WikiLeaks
data.description: This is a dark theme for WikiLeaks.
data.css:
/* https://userstyles.org/users/152378 */                              
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("wikileaks.org")
{

  HTML, 
 .navbar
  {
    background-color: #232323!important;
  }

  .vectorTabs span,
 .vectorTabs
  {
    background: #232323!important;
  }

  BODY,
 #mw-page-base, 
 .portal
  {
    background: transparent!important;
  }

  .static-page, 
 .dropdown-toggle,
 #search-pagination,
 .mw-search-profile-tabs, 
 TR[style="background: white"], 
 #footer, 
 .daterangepicker td.off, 
 .daterangepicker td.off.in-range, 
 .daterangepicker td.off.start-date, 
 .daterangepicker td.off.end-date,
 .results-section, 
 #wrapper, 
 #header,
 #content,
 .constraints,  
 .sidebar,  
 .top-navigation, 
 .side-nav,
 .panel, 
 .western, 
 .wp-caption, 
 #featured,  
 div#userloginForm form, 
 div#userlogin form#userlogin2, 
 DIV[style="padding-top: 0.2em; padding-bottom: 0.2em; background: #f9f9f9;"],  
 .noprint.toccolours,
 ul#filetoc, 
 .menu ul li a, 
 .doc, 
 .bigdoc, 
 .thumbinner,
 .alert, 
 .tagsinput,
 .csstransforms #workspace .sharespace::before,
 .js-toggle-symbols, 
 TD[style="text-align: center; background-color: white;"],
 .trow:nth-child(2n),
 .MainPageBG, 
 .pBody,     
 FIELDSET,
 TABLE,
 TH, 
 H1, 
 H2,
 H3, 
 H4, 
 H5, 
 H6,  
 HR, 
 LI,
 #bodyContent > DIV,
 #main,
 .container,
 #button_next_row,
 .noarticletext
  {
    background-color: transparent!important;
  }

  #sidebar ul.nav-list li em,
 #maincontent ul.nav > li.active > a,
 .ui.basic.button:focus, 
 .ui.basic.buttons .button:focus, 
 #ca-history > SPAN > A:hover, 
 #ca-viewsource > SPAN > A:hover, 
 #ca-talk > SPAN > A:hover,
 .daterangepicker td.available:not(.end-date):not(.start-date):hover, 
 .daterangepicker td.in-range:not(.end-date):not(.start-date), 
 a.btn.btn-xs.mail-switch,
 .tag-navigation a:hover, 
 .tag-navigation a:active, 
 .tag-navigation .active a, 
 .metadata,
 .dropdown-menu, 
 .download a:hover,
 .modal-content,
 #helpterm,
 #topmenu > A:not(:hover),
 .ui-datepicker,  
 #pane-tabs .pane-header.nottop:not(.tab-right),
 #leftmenu a,
 #leftmenu .pick, 
 #leftmenu .sort, 
 .tab.selected,
 .dnmain, 
 .sbinv,
 .btn-wl-empty,
 .label-default,
 #p-cactions li a, 
 .catlinks,
 .navbar-nav > li > .dropdown-menu,  
 .wlsearch .nav-tabs > .active > a,
 .wlsearch .nav-tabs > li > a:hover,  
 .wlsearch .nav-tabs > li > a:focus, 
 .nav-tabs > li.active > a, 
 .nav-tabs > li.active > a:hover, 
 .nav-tabs > li.active > a:focus, 
 .nav > li > a:not(.dropdown-toggle):hover, 
 .nav > li > a:not(.dropdown-toggle):focus,
 .panel-heading,
 .panel-primary
  {
    background-color: #0B0B0B!important;
  }

  .btn-group > .btn:not(.dropdown-toggle)
  {
    background: #0B0B0B!important;
  }

  .dialog > div,
 .dialog > p,
 .warningbox
  {
    background-color: #0B0B0B!important;
    border-color: red!important;
  }

  #efm-button,
 #efm-button #efm-menu,
 .ui.basic.button:hover, 
 .ui.basic.buttons .button:hover, 
 #search-pagination .pagination a:hover,
 #uniquer > DIV > DIV:first-child > DIV > DIV > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TH, 
 #uniquer > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TH,  
 #uniquer > DIV > TABLE > THEAD > TR > TH,
 #uniquer > DIV > DIV:first-child > DIV > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TH, 
 #uniquer > DIV > DIV:last-child > DIV > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TH,
 #uniquer > DIV > DIV > DIV > DIV > DIV > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TH,
 #uniquer > DIV > DIV > DIV > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TH, 
 #mw-trackingcategories-table > THEAD > TR > TH,  
 .attachments li a:hover,
 .tile > a:hover,
 .flash.warning,   
 .alert.alert-info:not(H2),
 .toolbox .need-inspiration, 
 .dnpage h1, 
 .menu ul li a:hover,
 table.report th,
 .TablePager th,
 table.wikitable th, 
 table.prettytable th, 
 .zabuto_calendar .table th,
 .table.table-bordered.results th,
 .table-striped > tbody > tr:nth-child(2n+1) > th, 
 #searchresult > DIV > TABLE > THEAD > TR > TH,
 #content-main > DIV:last-child > TABLE > THEAD,
 .tablesorter > THEAD > TR > TH
  {
    background-color: #131313!important;
  }

  .info,
 .warning,
 DIV[style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0.5em; padding-left: 2em; background-color: #eeeeee;"],  
 TR[style="background: #eee"], 
 .diff-context,
 .smwb-title,
 .smwb-center,   
 .smwb-propvalue TH, 
 .smwb-propvalue TD, 
 .calendar-table,
 .ranges li,
 .result,
 .leak-navigation li:hover, 
 .leak-navigation .active, 
 .release-section h3,
 .tile > a,
 .footer-wrapper, 
 .download a,
 .toolbox,     
 .flash.notice,  
 .odd.doc:not(:hover), 
 .odd.bigdoc:not(:hover),
 .quote tr:hover,
 #doc_list tr:nth-of-type(2n+0), 
 #qform tr:nth-child(odd)
  {
    background-color: #171717!important;
  }

  .btn.btn-default.dropdown-toggle
  {
    background: #171717!important;
  }

  #maincontent ul.nav > li > a,
 .ui.basic.button, 
 .ui.basic.buttons .button,
 A[data-toggle="tab"][href="#text"],
 .tab-content, 
 .detail,
 .search-filter,
 .search-item,
 .publication-filter, 
 .code-block,
 .code,
 .note, 
 #uniquer > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-child(even) > TD,
 #uniquer > UL > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-child(even) > TD, 
 #uniquer > DIV > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-child(even) > TD,
 #uniquer > DIV > DIV > DIV > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-child(even) > TD, 
 #uniquer > DIV > DIV > DIV > DIV > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-child(even) > TD,
 #uniquer > DIV > DIV > DIV > DIV > DIV > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-child(even) > TD, 
 #uniquer > DIV > DIV:last-child > DIV > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-child(3) > TD:last-child > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-child(even) > TD, 
 #toc, 
 .toc,
 .mw-changeslist-legend, 
 #mw-trackingcategories-table > TBODY > TR > TD,
 #ca-history > SPAN > A, 
 #ca-viewsource > SPAN > A, 
 #ca-talk > SPAN > A,
 .email:nth-child(2n+1), 
 .table-striped-2 tr:nth-child(4n-1), 
 .table-striped-2 tr:nth-child(4n),     
 .table-striped > tbody > tr:nth-child(2n+1) > td,
 #db1 > H2, 
 #db2 > H2, 
 #db3 > H2,
 #db4 > H2,
 #db5 > H2,
 #db6 > H2,
 #db7 > H2,
 .popup,
 #mp-topbanner, 
 #mp-left,
 #mp-right,
 .trow:nth-child(2n+1),
 .table.table-bordered.results tr,
 .wikitable > TBODY > TR,
 .prettytable > TBODY > TR,
 .TablePager td,
 .zabuto_calendar .table tr td,
 .table-striped.table-bordered,
 .breadcrumb, 
 .alert-warning, 
 .tablesorter *,
 .well,
 .synopsis td span,   
 TR[style="vertical-align:top;background-color:#ddd;"],
 TR[style="background:#eee;"], 
 CODE,  
 PRE,
 .jumbotron,  
 #doc_list tr:nth-of-type(2n+1), 
 #qform tr
  {
    background-color: #1C1C1C!important;
  }

  TD[style="padding: 0 1em;"], 
 #doc_list tr:hover
  {
    background-color: #202020!important;
  }

  .tip,
 .tip::before,   
 table.gallery td,
 .synopsis
  {
    background-color: #2C2C2C!important;
  }

  table#doc_list td > div.cable > div.synopsis tr
  {
    background: inherit!important;
  }

  .cable, 
 table#doc_list th, 
 TEXTAREA, 
 INPUT, 
 SELECT
  {
    background-color: #333!important;
  }

  .label.rub33
  {
    background-color: #78A!important;
  }

  .ranges li.active, 
 .ranges li:hover
  {
    background: #08C!important;
  }
  
 #efm-highlight:hover, 
 #efm-unhighlight:hover,
 del.diffchange,
 #doc_list > TBODY > TR > TD > A:hover,  
 table.graphics a:hover,
 a.st:hover, 
 a.j:hover, 
 #leftmenu a:hover, 
 .tab:not(.selected):hover,
 .dropdown-menu li a:hover,
 .dropdown-menu li a:focus
  {
    background: #400!important;
  }

  .list strong
  {
    background-color: #040!important;
  }

  ins.diffchange, 
 #qform > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-child(12),
 .dropdown-menu .divider
  {
    background-color: #004!important;
  }

  .dnflood
  {
    background-color: rgba(3, 6, 13, .8)!important;
  }

  .today,
 SPAN[style="background: #ffff00"],  
 .badge.badge-event,  
 .efm-hi
  {
    background-color: firebrick!important;
  }

  .day:hover,  
 .is_highlighted,
 .button-face.search-tips-button,
 #heatmap .rw:hover .lbl
  {
    background-color: royalblue!important;
  }

  #p-cactions li.selected a, 
 .ontop,   
 .btn-warning
  {
    background: maroon!important;
    border-color: maroon!important;
  }

  #button_next20,
 #button_next100,
 #button_next500
  {
    background-color: maroon!important;
    border: 1px solid maroon!important;
  }

  #uniquer .pf
  {
    background-color: white!important;
    box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px 1px #000!important;
    z-index: 0!important;
  }

  #text > HR,
 .search-item,
 .attachments li a:hover,
 .thumbimage, 
 #commentrequest, 
 #releasebar li, 
 .alert-warning, 
 #leftmenu a
  {
    border-color: #000!important;
  }

  .ui.button, 
 .ui.vertical.basic.tiny.buttons, 
 TH,
 TD,
 .morearticles, 
 .sort, 
 .langlist, 
 .quote
  {
    border-color: #0B0B0B!important;
  }

  #helpterm
  {
    border: 2px solid #0B0B0B!important;
  }

  .daterangepicker::after, 
 .daterangepicker::before
  {
    border-bottom-color: #0B0B0B!important;
  }

  #maincontent object.show-document,
 .oo-ui-panelLayout-framed,
 .mw-changeslist-legend,
 #toc, 
 .toc, 
 .tab-content, 
 .tip,
 .tip::before,
 .tile > a,
 .news .content ul li, 
 .panel.panel-default, 
 .csstransforms .toolbox .need-inspiration::before, 
 .toolbox .need-inspiration, 
 .toolbox,
 #mp-topbanner, 
 .flash.notice, 
 #uniquer, 
 .message,  
 CODE,
 PRE, 
 #p-cactions li,
 .nav-tabs > li > a:hover,
 .nav-tabs > li.active > a,
 .nav-tabs
  {
    border-color: #111!important;
  }

  #efm-button #efm-menu
  {
    border: 1px solid #131313!important;
  }

  .article,
 .release-section li,  
 .leak-navigation,
 .top-navigation, 
 HR
  {
    border-color: #171717!important;
  }

  .subd
  {
    border-left-color: #171717!important;
    border-bottom-color: #171717!important;
  }

  BLOCKQUOTE, 
 table.smwb-factbox
  {
    border-left-color: #171717!important;
  }

  table.smwb-ifactbox
  {
    border-right-color: #171717!important;
  }

  table.gallery td,
 .tab-pane,  
 .pc,
 .btn-group > .btn:not(.dropdown-toggle),
 #pane-tabs .pane-header.nottop:not(.tab-right),
 table.cable td, 
 table.cable th
  {
    border-color: #232323!important;
  }

  #simpleSearch
  {
    border-color: #333!important;
  }

  INPUT,  
 SELECT,   
 TEXTAREA, 
 #searchInput
  {
    border: 0 solid #333!important;
  }

  .diff-deletedline
  {
    border-color: #400!important;
  }

  .links:not(TD)
  {
    border-color: #040!important;
  }

  .diff-addedline
  {
    border-color: #004!important;
  }

  .btn>.caret,
 .dropup>.btn>.caret
  {
    border-top-color: deepskyblue!important;
  }

  .flash.warning
  {
    border-color: maroon!important;
  }

  .menu ul li a:hover, 
 #heatmap .rw:hover
  {
    border-color: royalblue!important;
  }

  .tag-navigation a:active, 
 .tag-navigation .active a
  {
    border-bottom-color: seagreen!important;
  }

  .calendar-table,
 .ranges li
  {
    border: 1px solid transparent!important;
  }

  .static-page,   
 .sidebar,
 .detail,
 .search-filter,
 #search-pagination,
 .divider, 
 .mw-search-profile-tabs, 
 #pagehistory li, 
 #footer,
 div.text-header,
 div.text-dupe, 
 .results-section,
 .global-search,
 DIV[style="border-bottom: 1px solid #aaa;"],  
 .overMap, 
 .input-group-btn > .btn,
 #efm-menu,  
 .panel-default, 
 .wp-caption,  
 #featured, 
 div#userloginForm form, 
 div#userlogin form#userlogin2,  
 .noprint.toccolours,
 ul#filetoc,
 .MainPageBG,
 #mp-upper > TBODY > TR > TD:nth-child(2),
 .thumb,
 .thumbinner,
 .modal-header,
 #heatmap .rw,
 .tagsinput,
 #bodyContent > DIV, 
 IFRAME,
 LEGEND,
 #efm-button #efm-menu p, 
 .alert-info, 
 .page-header,
 .pagination > li > span, 
 .pagination > li > a, 
 .noarticletext, 
 FIELDSET,
 .catlinks,
 TABLE,
 #content,  
 .pBody, 
 H1,
 H2,
 .container-text img, 
 .input-section,
 .well,
 .panel.panel-primary
  {
    border-color: transparent!important;
  }

  .table-bordered > thead > tr > th,
 .list.issues THEAD,
 .list.issues TBODY
  {
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #0B0B0B!important;
  }

  #mp-left,
 #mp-right
  {
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #111!important;
  }

  .dropdown-menu
  {
    box-shadow: 0 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, .75)!important;
  }

  #efm-menu
  {
    box-shadow: -4px 4px 4px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .8)!important;
  }

  .pika-single.is-bound
  {
    box-shadow: 0 5px 15px -5px #FFF!important;
  }

  .oo-ui-textInputWidget.oo-ui-widget-enabled textarea, 
 .form-control, 
 INPUT,
 #viewerContainer
  {
    box-shadow: none!important;
  }

  .links:not(TD),
 SPAN[style="color:darkgreen;"]
  {
    color: #AFA!important;
  }

  .release, 
 .category, 
 .region, 
 .casualties
  {
    color: #0A0!important;
  }

  SPAN[style="color: rgb(0,51,102);"],  
 .panel-heading.panel-grey, 
 .input-prompt,
 H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6
  {
    color: aquamarine!important;
  }

  DIV[class="status"][style="background-color: yellow"], 
 DIV[class="status"][style="background-color: Yellow"],
 LABEL[for="wpRemember"], 
 .pagination .active > a,  
 .btn.focus, .btn:focus, .btn:hover, 
 .button-face:not(.support-link):not([href="https://search.wikileaks.org/advanced"]):hover,
 .button-face:not(.support-link):not([href="https://search.wikileaks.org/advanced"]):focus, 
 #trends .calendar-grid .year .date-label,
 SPAN[style="float: left; margin-right: 0.3em;"], 
 .left05, 
 .countries, 
 .legend h5,
 #showhide
  {
    color: black!important;
  }

  #submit > DIV > DIV:nth-child(4) > DIV:last-child
  {
    color: cyan!important;
  }

 #efm-button #efm-menu a:hover,
 SPAN[style="color: #216B7C;"]:hover,
 A:not(.btn-success):not(.new):hover, 
 A:not(.btn-success):not(.new):focus
  {
    color: darkseagreen!important;
  }

  .dropdown-toggle,
 a.btn.btn-xs.mail-switch:hover, 
 #bterms:not(.selected), 
 #bfile:not(.selected),
 #bid:not(.selected),
 .tile > a:hover .title, 
 .tile > a:hover .timestamp,
 .top-navigation .support-link:not(:hover):not(:focus),  
 A[href="https://search.wikileaks.org/advanced"],
 SPAN[style="color: #216B7C;"]:not(:hover),
 A:not(.new):not(.dropdown-toggle):not(.searchbutton):not(.button-face):not(.btn):not(.btn-wl):not(.tab):not(:hover):not(:focus),      
 .btn.btn-default.dropdown-toggle:hover,
 .btn-group > .btn:not(.dropdown-toggle):hover
  {
    color: deepskyblue!important;
  }

  .detail-heading,
 .sub,
 #button-save-highlights,
 #efm-button #efm-menu #efm-permalink span,
 #sidebar label.nav-header.plus::after, 
 #sidebar label.nav-header.minus::after,
 .ui.basic.button, 
 .ui.basic.buttons .button, 
 .label, 
 .icon-search,   
 .is_highlighted, 
 .searchin, 
 .filter,
 .dataset-name.pull-right,
 #search-pagination .pagination span, 
 #search-pagination .pagination em, 
 div.search-item div.description, 
 div.search-item div.doc_text,
 .tip,   
 .info,  
 SPAN[style="color: rgb(0,0,0);"], 
 .mail-content, 
 #content header,
 #uniquer > B,
 .extract,  
 #contentSub,
 .date-label,
 .pane-header:not(.tab-right), 
 .s_val, 
 a.st:hover,  
 #doc_list > TBODY > TR > TD > A:hover, 
 a.j:hover,
 #leftmenu a:hover,
 #content,  
 .input-group-btn > .btn,
 .btn-group > .btn:not(.dropdown-toggle),
 .wlsearch, 
 STRONG,
 LI,
 LEGEND,  
 TH,  
 TD,
 TEXTAREA,
 PRE,
 BLOCKQUOTE,
 P:not(.alert),
 LABEL, 
 SELECT, 
 INPUT,
 BODY
  {
    color: gainsboro!important;
  }

  a.new:focus,
  a.new:hover
  {
    color: gold!important;
  }

  .tab.selected,   
 CODE,   
 .programlisting,
 acronym, 
 .toggle-acronyms
  {
    color: moccasin!important;
  }

 .warningbox
  {
    color: orange!important;
  }

  a.new, 
 .mw-plusminus-neg
  {
    color: orangered!important;
  }

  ABBR,
 .errorbox, 
 .successbox, 
 .flash.notice, 
 .onion-url,
 .h1redfont, 
 .h2redfont, 
 .redfont
  {
    color: salmon!important;
  }

  SPAN[style="color: rgb(0,128,0);"],   
 .mw-plusminus-pos
  {
    color: springgreen!important;
  }

  .count,
 SPAN[style="color: rgb(153,51,0);"],
 FONT[style="COLOR: GREY"], 
 SPAN[style="font-family: Times new roman,serif;"],
 table#synopsis .s_key *, 
 I, 
 dt,
 .date,
 address, 
 .label-default,
 .editorials span,
 .timestamp
  {
    color: tan!important;
  }

 .label.rub33,
 .ui.basic.button:hover, 
 .ui.basic.buttons .button:hover,
 .ui.basic.button:focus, 
 .ui.basic.buttons .button:focus, 
 .button-face.search-tips-button, 
 .btn-wl:not(.btn-wl-empty),
 A[class="btn btn-primary btn-sm"][href="/advanced"], 
 .searchbutton:hover,
 .searchbutton.active:hover,  
 .efm-hi
  {
    color: white!important;
  }

  .legend p
  {
    color: black!important;
  }

  IMG[src="/w/images/6/6b/WL_Hour_Glass.jpg"]
  {
    -webkit-filter: invert(83%) hue-rotate(210deg);
    filter: invert(83%) hue-rotate(210deg);
  }

  .oo-ui-checkboxInputWidget [type="checkbox"] + span,   
 .mw-ui-checkbox,
 a.top, 
 a.on,
 .ui-slider,
 .pagination > .disabled > span, 
 .pagination > .disabled > span:hover, 
 .pagination > .disabled > span:focus, 
 .pagination > .disabled > a, 
 .pagination > .disabled > a:hover, 
 .pagination > .disabled > a:focus,
 .pagination > .active > a, 
 .pagination > .active > span, 
 .pagination > .active > a:hover, 
 .pagination > .active > span:hover, 
 .pagination > .active > a:focus, 
 .pagination > .active > span:focus,
 .pagination > li > a, 
 div.wlspagination ul li a, 
 div.wlspagination ul li span,
 div.wlspagination ul li.active ~ * a, 
 div.wlspagination ul li.active ~ * span,  
 div.wlspagination ul li.first a, 
 div.wlspagination ul li.last a,
 div.wlspagination ul li.last span,     
 IMG[class="spip_logos"][alt="Andy Worthington (UK)"],
 IMG[class="spip_logos"][alt="Asia Sentinel (Hong Kong)"],
 IMG[class="spip_logos"][alt="Brecha (Uruguay)"],
 IMG[class="spip_logos"][alt="Bureau of Investigative Journalism (UK)"],
 IMG[class="spip_logos"][alt="Carta Capital (Brazil)"],
 IMG[class="spip_logos"][alt="El País (Spain)"],
 IMG[class="spip_logos"][alt="La Jornada (Mexico)"],
 IMG[class="spip_logos"][alt="Le Monde (France)"],
 IMG[class="spip_logos"][alt="Mediapart (France)"],
 IMG[class="spip_logos"][alt="New Zealand Herald (New Zealand)"],

data.name: LoganTheRiperRooFan NAUTTP
Gravity's Dark Anilist
data.description:
Please use the Github for issue reporting.
Github: https://github.com/Z3ROGRAV1TYx/Anilist-Dark-Theme

It is highly reccomended to use this paired with @Hoh's userscript: https://github.com/hohMiyazawa/Automail

____________

Still new to css, so stuff may be broke or messed up. Using this as a learning experience. 

For a more stable release, you may want to take a look at SlickBoy (@Erwin)'s theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/162817/anilist-hossori which this was forked from.
